title: What are the details of status during  startup process
answer:
(1) When the CPE is powered on without any WiMAX parameters, all indicators (Power indicator ,the WiMAX indicators and Tel indicators) will blink, after the startup of CPE is completed ,  power indicator will still bright, all the WiMAX indicators and Tel indicators will turn off
(2) After the WiMAX parameters was configured, all indicators (Power indicator ,the WiMAX indicators and Tel indicator) will blink when  CPE is powered on, after the startup of CPE is completed,  the Power indicator will still bright, the number of lighted WiMAX indicators depends on the signal strength, the stronger the WiMAX signals are, the more WiMAX indicators are on. The Tel indicator will turn off
(3) Some Operators have customized WiMAX parameters which preset in CPE, thus the end-user does not need to configure it before surfer Internet
